data.title: Xiaomi MI Band 3
data.description:
* The size can be adjusted according to the circumstance of individual wrist .Small size is 12mm * 180mm and large size is 12mm * 210mm. 
 6 colors for you to match your daily style. 
 Personalized Your Xiaomi mi band 3 Smart watch Activity Tracker Wristband ,this is a refined stylish replacement wrist band. 
 Tracker NOT included! Replacement Band for Xiaomi mi band 3 Activity Tracker ONLY, NOT for xiaomi other models! 
 Easily insert your Xiaomi mi band 3 tracker into the wristband, no tools needed. This Milanese loop stainless steel replacement band locks tracker securely.

data.title: Apple iPhone XR (64GB)
data.description:
6.1-inch Liquid Retina display (LCD) 
 IP67 water and dust resistant (max depth of 1 m up to 30 mins) 
 12MP camera with OIS and 7MP TrueDepth front camera 
 Face ID for secure authentication and Apple Pay 
 A12 Bionic with next-generation Neural Engine

data.title: WOODIES Walnut Wood Sunglasses with Black Polarized Lenses for Men or Women
data.description:
Wood frame 
 anti-reflective lens 
 Polarized 
 Lens width: 2 inches 
 Lens height: 2 inches 
 COMFORTABLE: 50% Lighter than Ray-Bans 
 SAFETY: Polarized Lenses Provide 100% UVA/UVB Protection

data.title: Fire 7 Tablet (7inch display, 8 GB, with Special Offers)
data.description:
7inch IPS display , 8 or 16 GB of internal storage (up to 256 GB with microSD) 
 1.3 GHz quad-core processor 
 Up to 8 hours of battery life 
 Alexa enabled 
 1 GB of RAM 
 VGA front-facing camera + 2 MP rear-facing camera with 720p HD video recording 
 Dual-band Wi-Fi

data.title: Clear Shampoo Deep Cleanse 2 In 1 400Ml
data.description:
The Production date is 07/27/2017 and it will expire 3 years after in 07/28/2020. 
 Clear Shampoo New Formula No Need To Bother About Dandruff Deep Cleanse 2 In 1 Helps Activate Scalps Natural 400Ml/13.52Oz
